title: Configuration Anti-Pattern: Mixed Module Systems
description: High technical debt: ES Module vs CommonJS conflicts throughout codebase with package.json 'type': 'module' setting but multiple files using require() statements. Causes 'ReferenceError: require is not defined' errors. Root cause: Inconsistent module system usage and lack of project configuration awareness. Prevention: Standardize on ES modules, convert remaining CommonJS files, and implement module system validation in CI/CD.
